metadata.title: CVE-2015-8041 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
Multiple integer overflows in the NDEF record parser in hostapd before 2.5and wpa_supplicant before 2.5 allow remote attackers to cause a denial ofservice (process crash or infinite loop) via a large payload length fieldvalue in an (1) WPS or (2) P2P NFC NDEF record, which triggers anout-of-bounds read.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-8041` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

hostapd - 1:2.4-0ubuntu5
wpagui - 2.4-0ubuntu5
wpasupplicant - 2.4-0ubuntu5
No subscription required

criterions.comment: wpa package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.4-0ubuntu5').
wpa package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.4-0ubuntu5').
